stanza.line: Thy glass will show thee how thy beautieswear
Thy dial how thy precious minuteswaste
These vacant leaves thy mind imprint willbear
And of this book this learning mayst thoutaste
The wrinkles which thy glass will trulyshow
Of mouthed graves will give thee memory
Thou by thy dial shady stealth maystknow
Commit to these waste blanks and thou shaltfind
Those children nursed delivered from thybrain
To take a new acquaintance of thymind
These offices so oft as thou wiltlook
Shall profit thee and much enrich thybook
